'''Music Gadgets''' are [[gadget]]s that can be used to play music. They can be obtained from various NPC [[Shop]]s and during [[Rhythm Game]] [[event]]s.

==Types==
{{Items by Category List|Music Gadgets}}

==Try Out Instrument==
{{Description|'''Try Out Instrument'''<br>You can use this function to try out all of the instruments in [[Repertoire of Myriad Melodies]] and check how to acquire them.<br>As you play the piece by following the guidance, you'll find out how the instrument works and what it sounds like.}}
Talk to [[Sansa]] to access the '''Try Out Instrument''' interface.

Selecting an instrument will allow play testing and the {{Icon|Preview Tone}} Preview Tone option.

==Instrument Settings==
Can be accessed for each instrument from the [[Inventory]] or when using the instrument.

===Change Keys===
Depending on the gadget, the keys available differ.

Has a Restore Defaults button to reset keys.

==Ensemble Performance==
{{Description|You are in Co-Op Mode. Invite other players to perform as an ensemble?<br>Participants in an ensemble must be in the {{Color|bp|same scene}} and have {{Color|bp|instruments equipped}}.}}
In [[Co-Op Mode]], players can start an ensemble performance by equipping an instrument and being in the same location. Using the music gadget will give the option invite other players or continue as Single Player.

==Description==
{{Description|When using the Performance function, please make sure that you use an original composition or have the relevant rights to use the melody you are playing in order to avoid harming the rights of any third parties and to avoid any actions in breach of or incompatible with our Terms of Service. Otherwise, we may have to restrict your use of this function.<br>Additionally, the content you perform can be heard and used by other players using this in-game function.
